about.subtitle: We are a Latin American startup committed to transforming digital processes for companies worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: It all started with a favor between friends. A buddy asked us for help with an Excel spreadsheet that had become a real headache. We began creating formulas, optimizing its format, and organizing data to make it easier to manage.
story.paragraph2: What seemed like a small fix turned into something much bigger: we built him a website, started automating processes, and saved him hours of work. The result was a web app that changed the way he managed his business.
story.paragraph3: From being just two curious, self-taught people, we grew into a team of professionals from different areas. We teach each other, share knowledge, and keep alive that collaborative spirit that brought us to where we are today.

0.question: Can I contact Solware for a free consultation?
0.answer: Solware can help your company increase operational efficiency, reduce costs, improve customer experience, and ease the adoption of new technologies to keep you competitive in the market.

1.question: What makes us different from other tech companies?
1.answer: We stand out for our personalized approach, proven experience, and commitment to measurable results. We combine deep technical knowledge with a unique understanding of business needs, delivering tailored solutions and continuous support.

2.question: How do we ensure measurable results in every project?
2.answer: We implement a rigorous system of KPIs and metrics from the start, setting clear and measurable goals. We conduct ongoing monitoring, provide detailed reports, and adjust strategies as needed to ensure project success.

3.question: How can Solware help my company?
3.answer: Absolutely! We offer initial consultations at no cost where we analyze your needs and present personalized solutions. You can contact us through our form, WhatsApp, or email.

4.question: What benefits will I get by automating processes with Solware?
4.answer: By automating your processes with Solware, you’ll get reduced operational costs, elimination of manual errors, increased productivity, enhanced customer experience, real-time data for decision-making, and scalability for your business.

privacyPolicy.title: Solware Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.paragraph1: Your privacy is important to us. At Solware, we respect your privacy and comply with any applicable laws and regulations regarding the personal information we may collect about you, whether through our website, applications, or associated services.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2: Personal information refers to any data that can be used to identify you as an individual, including name, address, email, device details, payment information, and how you interact with our digital platforms.
privacyPolicy.paragraph3: If our site contains links to third-party services, please note that those services have their own privacy policies. We recommend that you read their policies before providing them with your information. This Privacy Policy does not cover activities conducted outside of our platforms.
privacyPolicy.paragraph4: This policy is effective as of: 03/01/2024
privacyPolicy.paragraph7: The information we collect falls into two main categories:

infoRec.paragraph1: Data you consciously provide when using our services, such as contact forms or registrations.

infoRec2.paragraph1: Data automatically sent from your devices when you access our platforms, such as IP address, browser type, and usage data.

finality.title: Purpose of the Information
finality.paragraph3: Communicate with you in response to inquiries.
finality.paragraph4: Protect the security of our platforms.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.paragraph1: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.paragraph2: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
rights.paragraph3: Withdraw consent for the use of your data.
rights.paragraph4: File complaints with data protection authorities.
